variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a deletion of one amino acid (Arg41) in the PTEN protein.

Material used.Description: DNA was extracted from tissue samples for sequencing analysis.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_000314.5:c.124delC was found to be present in the DNA sample, confirming a diagnosis of Cowden syndrome.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent tissue samples were analyzed for each patient.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was sequenced twice to ensure accuracy.

Basic positive control.Description: Not applicable in this case as the aim is to identify the variant, not to compare with a known reference.

Basic negative control.Description: Not applicable in this case as the aim is to identify the variant, not to rule out its presence.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not required for this type of analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: The absence of the variant NM_000314.5:c.124delC in DNA samples indicates a normal condition.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: The presence of the variant NM_000314.5:c.124delC in DNA samples indicates an abnormal condition.
